amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC. __. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to implement the Departmental Regulation of the Department of Agriculture entitled "Policy Statement on Climate Change Adaptation" (Departmental Regulation 1070-001 (June 3, 2011)).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds to implement the Departmental Regulation of the Department of Agriculture entitled "Policy Statement on Climate Change Adaptation".
